name: Robofest 3.0 - 6x6 Autonomous Rover
description: Secured â‚¹2.5 Lakh funding, engineered a fully functional 6x6 autonomous rover with angle-based speed control, intelligent GPS navigation, PID control, obstacle avoidance and path planning.

name: Tweet Sentiment Analyzer
description: Flask-based web application for zero-shot sentiment analysis of tweets using Ollama LLM models (llama3.2) with LangChain integration. Captures nuances such as positivity, negativity, neutrality, sarcasm, and humor.

name: News Ministry Classification
description: Research project to build APIs for scraping news articles and classify them into 61 ministry categories using BERT transformers. Achieved 91% top-3 accuracy on a dataset of 36,000 articles.

name: Agent-Based Snake Game
description: RL-based Snake Game using PyTorch, PyGame, and Matplotlib. Features real-time visualization of the game and dynamic reward graph, offering insights into the agent's learning process and decision-making.

name: Semi-Autonomous Agricultural 4x4 Robot
description: Jetson Xavier-based agricultural robot with GPS navigation, real-time plant disease monitoring using YOLOv8, and environmental sensors for farm automation and safety.
